name: vortex-chess-engine
description: A TypeScript chess engine targeting ~1600 Elo strength

scripts.build:cli: tsc src/cli.ts --outDir dist --module commonjs --target es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:cli
scripts.test:cutechess: npm run build:all && cutechess-cli -engine cmd="$PWD/dist/cli.js" name="Vortex" -engine cmd=stockfish name="Stockfish" option."Skill Level"=5 -each proto=uci tc=40/60 -rounds 10 -repeat -pgnout games.pgn
